programme.title: Hit-and-Run Squad
programme.desc: A hit-and-run police task force chases an out-of-control businessman committing crimes with his madness for speed and cars.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: A framed man (John Ireland) takes a rich woman's (Dorothy Malone) Jaguar, with her in it, and enters a road race that ends in Mexico.

programme.title: Shaolin Wooden Men
programme.desc: A fighter vows not to speak until he finds the masked man who killed his father.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: A monk's son (Yue Wong) combines the Tiger and Crane fighting styles to defeat an evil priest (Lieh Lo) and avenge his father.

programme.title: Master of the Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: A blind man disguises himself as a priest and vows to kill a one-armed boxer with a weapon that can decapitate.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: An ex-member of the Ch'ing emperor's flying-blade force develops a similar weapon to repel attacks on innocent commoners.

programme.title: Fear in the City

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: An explosive ordnance disposal officer has to bring a bomber to justice.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A bomb disposal officer becomes a suspect in a terrorist attack.

programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: Two people (Bradford Dillman, Heather Menzies) unwittingly free a mad military scientist's (Kevin McCarthy) mutant fish near a summer camp and resort lake.
